original_text: And as she was going to bring it, he called to her and said, “Bring me a morsel of bread in your hand.”
korean_text: 그가 가지러 갈 때에 엘리야가 그를 불러 이르되 청하건대 네 손의 떡 한 조각을 내게로 가져오라

sentences.original_text: And as she was going to bring it,
“Bring me a morsel of bread in your hand.”
sentences.korean_translation: “네 손에 떡 한 조각을 가져다 주라.”
